# vpsie_monitoring_rule (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vpsie_monitoring_rule" "example" {
  rule_name      = "high-cpu-alert"
  metric_type    = "cpu"
  condition      = "above"
  threshold_type = "percent"
  threshold      = "80"
  period         = "5m"
  frequency      = "1m"
  email          = "admin@example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `condition` (String)
- `email` (String)
- `frequency` (String)
- `metric_type` (String)
- `period` (String)
- `rule_name` (String)
- `threshold` (String)
- `threshold_type` (String)

### Optional

- `action_key` (String)
- `action_name` (String)
- `status` (String)
- `threshold_id` (String)
- `vms` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `created_on` (String)
- `identifier` (String)
